title: The Fallen Angel
description: We're a match made in hell and matches always burn.Once upon a myth...An angel fell in love with the devil.Salvi Moretti.I was his Eve, and he was my Lucifer.Once, on Halloween, I sold my soul to the Devil. I considered Salvi Moretti my God, but he turned out to be the Devil in disguise. He can break my wings, but he may have forgotten my claws will always come out. Eve died under that bridge and from the deepest underworld, a new entity was born. Lilith has risen.Welcome to New York's Underworld.The sequel to the Devil's Lair dark mafia crime romance series. This concludes Salvi and Ehva's story.
author: Beena Khan
